p: NHBE cells infected (MOI = 0.5) with TX/02 (H5N3) induced higher apical IL-1α expression and significantly more basolateral expression (p<0.05), evident at 24 h pi, compared to infection with the other AIV viruses or mock treatment ( Fig. 7A, B). In contrast, MI/06 (H5N1) induced a higher level of basolateral IL-1α expression compared to the other AIV between 2–6 h pi ( Fig. 7B). Likewise, human A/NY infection induced a significantly (p<0.05) higher level of basolateral IL-1α expression at 6 h and 24 h pi compared to mock controls ( Fig. 7B).
